overview: Recorded Live in Italy 1981.  Track list:  1.	Feelin' Alright?  2.	Look What You've Done  3.	A Whiter Shade Of Pale  4.	Sweet Little Woman  5.	Just Like Always  6.	Jealous Kind  7.	Shocked  8.	Hitchcock Railway  9.	Watching The River Flow  10.	Delta Lady  11.	The Letter  12.	You Are So Beautiful  13.	With A Little Help From My Friends
title: Joe Cocker: In Concert
